ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I carry sometimes up to 3 sets of one piece, ya kinda get used to it.  I havent been encumbered in ages. 99% of the time when doing raids i m hitting 255 str.
ygData.messageBody:
I carry sometimes up to 3 sets of one piece, ya kinda get used to it. I
havent been encumbered in ages. 99% of the time when doing raids i'm hitting
255 str. Mind you the lute of the howler is a nice str boost. I usually
have a set of resist gear on me at all times, and my AC/hp gear is what i
wear normally, but I do haul around some singing steel parts for their
effects (boots/gloves) :)

Minkin
RIP
Aro

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: February 5, 2002 7:07 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Armor



I keep my imbrued/Sentry/Guardian pieces in the bank for raids. I wear my
singing steel for grinding. Each has a use.
Other stuff? I think tattered mantles are a good upgrade for shoulders.
drop off gullerback in BW. He has a ton of hitpoints and is very MR but
your other chants will do him in. Just be careful, his arms are a lot
longer than they look P

Christopher Sanders <christopher.sanders@...> wrote: Dilemma...I
have some Singing Steel, and I have some Imbrued. Problem is,
the pieces duplicate. Example, I have SS helm and Imbrued helm, SS arms and
Imbrued arm...etc. What is considered "better"? SS is real nice AC, but
it's leaving my stats lacking. Imbrued has some pretty good stats, but at
the cost of some AC.

Some have mentioned they carry 2 sets of armor. I'd rather not do that,
since I quickly get encumbered now as it is. Currently, my "fresh from the
bank going out to do stuff" weight is around 80/113. Add some armor to
that, and I'll be starting out encumbered.

Also, I really need to look at my shoulder, back, and waist slots. My
shoulders is still blood stained mantle, back is, I think decent, but don't
know what my options are, and my waist is the Straw Spun Belt. Decent AC at
10, but at 6 weight, I think it's too heavy. I wouldn't mind options that I
could go and get myself solo, but I have a 51 shaman friend who can help.
Oh, I'm 50, finally. :)

Any and all suggestions are very welcome.

Thanks!

Atonal
